snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey signed a measure Wednesday that would allow the sale of Tesla and other zero-emission cars in the state.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie signs measure that will allow sale of zero-emission cars, like those produced by Tesla, in the state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey signed a measure Wednesday that would allow the sale of Tesla and other zero-emission cars in the state.

headline.main: New Jersey to Allow Sale of Tesla Electric Cars
headline.print_headline: New Jersey to Allow Sale of Tesla Electric Cars
